result.execSummary:
The defendant Demetrius M Hoglund, #650734 was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: To be released to Dodge Correctional unless St Croix County requests.

superMiscConds.notes: $295.60 fine/costs to be paid through prison wages. Failure to pay will be civil judgment.

$7,811.34* Restitution, plus 10% surcharge of $781.13*, for a total of $8,592.47*, to be paid out of prison wages. Joint & Severel with Kevin Perry (14CF379) and Dominick Cruz (14CM472).  *corrected
***$4,756.41 Restitution, plus 10% surcharge of $475.64, for a total of $5,232.05, to be paid to the Department of Corrections.  Joint & Severel with Kevin Perry (14CF379).  ***Per Order of Court on 5/8/17.

Must provide DNA sample and pay the $200.00 DNA surcharge to be paid out of prison wages. Failure to pay will be civil judgment.   Defendant may request expungement of the DNA sample under Wis. Stat. 165.77(4) by petitioning the Wisconsin Department of Justice. Expungement of DNA is NOT a court process. 
For information see: http://www.doj.state.wi.us/dles/crime-labs/clb-forms.
May not possess or use firearms or body armor.
If not a U.S. Citizen, may face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights. Cannot hold elective office. Cannot vote.

supervisions.notes: Must register as a Sex Offender for life.

9:55 Defendant Demetrius M Hoglund in court with attorney Mark Drew Biller.  Defendant Demetrius M Hoglund in custody.  Malia Theresa Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  JP-clerk  Per Atty Biller - has received PSI.  Per DA Steffen, VR complied with.  DA problems with page 10 of PSI.  RG - Victim addresses court.  AG - Victim addresses court. DM - Victim addresses court.  10:15 DA Steffen addresses Ct.  10:41 Atty Biller addresses Ct.  11:02 Exhibit #1, recv'd.  Exhibit #2, recv'd.  Ms Hoglund, mom addresses ct.  11:05 DE addresses ct.  Break until 11:25.  11:50 back on record.  DE is not eligible for boot camp or AODA.  

SENTENCING: 
Count 1 - 20 years, 10 years initial, 10 years E/S.  Ct orders sex offender registration for life.  DNA sample - $200 surcharge.  Court Costs of $295.60.  Ct grants state 30 days for restitution of Victim DM.  

Theft - Ct orders restitution of $1,306.00 for stolen items J/S with Perry and Cruz.  Cleaning  - $6,505.34 and 10% - $781.13.  Atty Biller has 60 days to object.  

Atty Biller has 60 days to figure out credit.

Ct gives Felony warnings.  No firearm.  Can not vote.  Restitution and court costs can be paid thru prison wages.  Ct - DE to be released to Dodge Correctional, unless St Croix County requests him back.  12:45 adj.
